name: Neo Lights
description:
Set in a cool futuristic world called Neo, players have to help a rolling ball get pass color boxes by tapping precisely at the right moment. Timing is everything. Tap at the exact moment to change color and access the box traps. This version features four different worlds to explore: Neo, Frost, Lava, and Reflection; Each features new intricate paths and more complicated color boxes. The further you go, the higher your score.

Game Features:
* 3 Modes, Speed, Dark, Endless
* 4 Action packed worlds
* 40 Fast paced levels
* Addictive one touch gameplay
* Game Center Leaderboard
* Share your scores with friends
* Proven to enhance reflex skills
